title: OOL Team (QuickFire) LF Diamond+ Top Laner
body:
**3rd place OOL team (QuickFire) is looking for a Diamond+ top laner to join our main roster.**

_Requirements are:_

- Season 6 Diamond+
- TeamSpeak 3 available
- Good quality microphone & internet
- Availability every second Saturday and Sunday for OOL tournaments, and available at least 3-4 nights per week for scrims (starting at 6/7pm AEST)
- Mature attitude
- Previous competitive experience is preferred but not necessary  
- Must speak fluent English

Please add **Makkam** or **Pinch** in-game and we will organize a time for tryouts.
